page.title: 11CHANGING TIMES:EMPLOYMENT
page.content: { Sumburgh Airport}employs around 232 people. Most of the people employed at the airport are from the surrounding area but about half travel down from the north There are many different kinds of jobs in the airport eg. Engineers, Management, Pilots etc. The airport has a restaurant and a shop so people are employed to work in there. Few people commute to Lerwick to work. The companies which operate in the airport are British Airways, Bristows, and British Air Ferries. There are approximately 16 army personell staying in our area. Some of their work is done at the Early Warning Station to the north of our area. The rest of their work is done at their social club. The men are here for a three year posting.
